name: World Tour Soccer 2003
synopsis: Soccer comes home as you lead your team to victory on or off the field. As a player, you'll tackle, pass, and shoot winning goals from the field. As an owner, you'll buy, sell, or trade players to create a winning team. More than 13,500 officially licensed FIFA pro players from 700 international and league teams compete in 10 stadiums around the globe. Your players can perform a variety of authentic moves, including high-flying headers, bicycle kicks, and goal-saving slide tackles.
